constructor.details: Constructor that initializes the most important configurations.

params._token: Token to be staked and harvested.

returns._0: Deposited amount and deposit end time.

getEstimated(uint256).details: Returns approximate reward assessed in the future.

params._includeDeposit: Should the finnished deposits be included into calculations.

getReward(address).details: Returns claimed and unclaimed user's reward.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setActive(bool).details: Allows an owner to stop or countinue deposits.

setDuration(uint256).details: Allows an owner to update duration of the deposits.

setReferralRewards(address).details: Allows an owner to update referral rewards module.

setRewardPerSec(uint256).details: Allows an owner to update reward rate per sec.

params._refferal: Referral address that will be set in case of the first stake.

stakeFor(address,uint256).details: Allows to stake for the specific user.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
